response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special price. Our proposal is as follows: $1,150,000. We believe this price reflects the exceptional quality and potential of the product while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a successful purchase.", "product_price": 1150000}
